description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Doses for IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 3 doses. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a cholera vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine, 3-dose schedule for clients aged 2–5 years
